Planter's Punch.instructions: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

Popped cherry.name: Popped cherry
Popped cherry.instructions: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!

Poppy Cocktail.name: Poppy Cocktail
Poppy Cocktail.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Port And Starboard.name: Port And Starboard
Port And Starboard.instructions: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine. Serve without mixing.

Port Wine Cocktail.name: Port Wine Cocktail
Port Wine Cocktail.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Port Wine Flip.name: Port Wine Flip
Port Wine Flip.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Porto flip.name: Porto flip
Porto flip.instructions: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

Quaker's Cocktail.name: Quaker's Cocktail
Quaker's Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Quarter Deck Cocktail.name: Quarter Deck Cocktail
Quarter Deck Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Queen Bee.name: Queen Bee
Queen Bee.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Queen Charlotte.name: Queen Charlotte
Queen Charlotte.instructions: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

Queen Elizabeth.name: Queen Elizabeth
Queen Elizabeth.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Quentin.name: Quentin
Quentin.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

Quick F**K.name: Quick F**K
Quick F**K.instructions: In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first. Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream

Quick-sand.name: Quick-sand
Quick-sand.instructions: Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice. The juice MUST have fruit pulp!

Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea.name: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea
Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass. Sip cautiously.

Radler.name: Radler
Radler.instructions: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).

Rail Splitter.name: Rail Splitter
Rail Splitter.instructions: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with ginger ale.

Raspberry Cooler.name: Raspberry Cooler
Raspberry Cooler.instructions: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Red Snapper.name: Red Snapper
Red Snapper.instructions: One shot each, shake n shoot

Rose.name: Rose
Rose.instructions: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass. Garnish and serve.

Royal Bitch.name: Royal Bitch
Royal Bitch.instructions: Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.

Royal Fizz.name: Royal Fizz
Royal Fizz.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

Royal Flush.name: Royal Flush
Royal Flush.instructions: Pour all the ingredients into tumbler over ice. Strain into glass.

Royal Gin Fizz.name: Royal Gin Fizz
Royal Gin Fizz.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Ruby Tuesday.name: Ruby Tuesday
Ruby Tuesday.instructions: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.

Rum Cobbler.name: Rum Cobbler
Rum Cobbler.instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

Rum Cooler.name: Rum Cooler
Rum Cooler.instructions: Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

Rum Milk Punch.name: Rum Milk Punch
Rum Milk Punch.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Rum Old-fashioned.name: Rum Old-fashioned
Rum Old-fashioned.instructions: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

Rum Punch.name: Rum Punch
Rum Punch.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl and serve.

Rum Runner.name: Rum Runner
Rum Runner.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.

Rum Screwdriver.name: Rum Screwdriver
Rum Screwdriver.instructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

Rum Sour.name: Rum Sour
Rum Sour.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

Rum Toddy.name: Rum Toddy
Rum Toddy.instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and one ice cube and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

Russian Spring Punch.name: Russian Spring Punch
Russian Spring Punch.instructions: Pour the ingredients into an highball glass, top with Sparkling wine.

Rusty Nail.name: Rusty Nail
Rusty Nail.instructions: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

Salty Dog.name: Salty Dog
Salty Dog.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

San Francisco.name: San Francisco
San Francisco.instructions: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the "creme", to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.

Sangria #1.name: Sangria #1
Sangria #1.instructions: Mix all together in a pitcher and refrigerate. Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste. Serve in wine glasses.

Sangria - The World's Best.name: Sangria - The World's Best
Sangria - The World's Best.instructions: Mix wine, sugar and fruit, and let sit in the fridge for 18-24 hours. The mixture will have a somewhat syrupy consistency. Before serving stir in brandy and cut the mixture with soda water until it have a thinner, more wine like consistency. Serve from a pitcher in wine glasses.

Sazerac.name: Sazerac
Sazerac.instructions: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.

Scooter.name: Scooter
Scooter.instructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Scotch Cobbler.name: Scotch Cobbler
Scotch Cobbler.instructions: Pour scotch, brandy, and curacao over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add the orange slice, top with the mint sprig, and serve.

Scotch Sour.name: Scotch Sour
Scotch Sour.instructions: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

Scottish Highland Liqueur.name: Scottish Highland Liqueur
Scottish Highland Liqueur.instructions: Combine all ingreds in aging container. Cover tightly and shake gently several times during the first 24 hrs. After 24 hrs, remove the lemon zest. Cover again and let stand in a cool, dark place for 2 weeks, shaking gently every other day. Strain through a wire sieve to remove the angelica root and fennel. Return to aging container, cover and let stand undisturbed in a cool dark place for 6 months. Siphon or pour clear liqueur into a sterile bottle. The cloudy dregs may be saved for cooking.

Screaming Orgasm.name: Screaming Orgasm
Screaming Orgasm.instructions: Pour first vodka, then Bailey's, then Kahlua into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir. Caution: use only high quality vodka. Cheap vodka can cause the Bailey's to curdle. Test your brand of vodka by mixing 1 Tsp each of vodka and Bailey's first.

Screwdriver.name: Screwdriver
Screwdriver.instructions: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

Sea breeze.name: Sea breeze
Sea breeze.instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

Sex on the Beach.name: Sex on the Beach
Sex on the Beach.instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

Shanghai Cocktail.name: Shanghai Cocktail
Shanghai Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Shark Attack.name: Shark Attack
Shark Attack.instructions: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

Sherry Eggnog.name: Sherry Eggnog
Sherry Eggnog.instructions: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Sherry Flip.name: Sherry Flip
Sherry Flip.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Shot-gun.name: Shot-gun
Shot-gun.instructions: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

Sidecar.name: Sidecar
Sidecar.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

Sidecar Cocktail.name: Sidecar Cocktail
Sidecar Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Singapore Sling.name: Singapore Sling
Singapore Sling.instructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.

Sloe Gin Cocktail.name: Sloe Gin Cocktail
Sloe Gin Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Smut.name: Smut
Smut.instructions: Throw it all together and serve real cold.

Snake Bite (UK).name: Snake Bite (UK)
Snake Bite (UK).instructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass. Drink. Fall over.

Snakebite and Black.name: Snakebite and Black
Snakebite and Black.instructions: Put blackcurrant squash in first up to about 1cm in glass. Then add the larger and cider one after another.

Snowball.name: Snowball
Snowball.instructions: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

Sol Y Sombra.name: Sol Y Sombra
Sol Y Sombra.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve. (The English translation of the name of this drink is "Sun and Shade", and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why. Thanks, Kirby.)

Space Odyssey.name: Space Odyssey
Space Odyssey.instructions: Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.

Spanish chocolate.name: Spanish chocolate
Spanish chocolate.instructions: Stir the milk with the chocolate and the cinnamon over low heat until the chocolate dissolves. Add the eggs and beat the mixture until it becomes thick, taking care not to boil. Serve in coffee mug.

Spiced Peach Punch.name: Spiced Peach Punch
Spiced Peach Punch.instructions: Combine peach nectar, orange juice and brown sugar in a large saucepan. Tie cinnamon and cloves in a small cheesecloth bag. Drop into saucepan. Heat slowly, stirring constantly, until sugar dissolves. Simmer 10 minutes. Stir in lime juice. Serve in hot mugs.

Spiking coffee.name: Spiking coffee
Spiking coffee.instructions: Incidentally, a pinch of cinnamon is indeed a nice addition to coffee but true heaven is a cardamom seed. Of course, you serve it in a coffee mug.

Spritz.name: Spritz
Spritz.instructions: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

Stinger.name: Stinger
Stinger.instructions: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass. May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.

Stone Sour.name: Stone Sour
Stone Sour.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.

Strawberry Daiquiri.name: Strawberry Daiquiri
Strawberry Daiquiri.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

Strawberry Lemonade.name: Strawberry Lemonade
Strawberry Lemonade.instructions: Throw everything into a blender and mix until fairly smooth. Serve over ice.

Strawberry Margarita.name: Strawberry Margarita
Strawberry Margarita.instructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake schnapps, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and strawberries with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

Strawberry Shivers.name: Strawberry Shivers
Strawberry Shivers.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

Sunny Holiday Punch.name: Sunny Holiday Punch
Sunny Holiday Punch.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

Surf City Lifesaver.name: Surf City Lifesaver
Surf City Lifesaver.instructions: Lots of ice and soda top up in tall glass with cherry and a grin.

Swedish Coffee.name: Swedish Coffee
Swedish Coffee.instructions: Pour the coffee in an ordinary coffee cup. Add the aquavit. Add sugar by taste. Stir and have a nice evening (morning)

Sweet Bananas.name: Sweet Bananas
Sweet Bananas.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

Sweet Sangria.name: Sweet Sangria
Sweet Sangria.instructions: Dissolve the sugar in hot water and cool. Peel the citrus fruits and break into wedges. Mix the wine, sugar syrup, fruit, and Fresca in a pitcher and put in the fridge for a few hours. Serve in tall glasses with a straw.

Sweet Tooth.name: Sweet Tooth
Sweet Tooth.instructions: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

Talos Coffee.name: Talos Coffee
Talos Coffee.instructions: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

Tennesee Mud.name: Tennesee Mud
Tennesee Mud.instructions: Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.

Tequila Fizz.name: Tequila Fizz
Tequila Fizz.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

Tequila Sour.name: Tequila Sour
Tequila Sour.instructions: Shake tequila, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

Tequila Sunrise.name: Tequila Sunrise
Tequila Sunrise.instructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Stir gently to create the sunrise effect. Garnish and serve.

Tequila Surprise.name: Tequila Surprise
Tequila Surprise.instructions: Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.

Texas Rattlesnake.name: Texas Rattlesnake
Texas Rattlesnake.instructions: Mix all ingredients and Shake well. Sweet at first, with a BITE at the end...

Texas Sling.name: Texas Sling
Texas Sling.instructions: Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.

Thai Coffee.name: Thai Coffee
Thai Coffee.instructions: Place the coffee and spices in the filter cone of your coffee maker. Brew coffee as usual, let it cool. In a tall glass, dissolve 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar in an ounce of the coffee (it's easier to dissolve than if you put it right over ice). Add 5-6 ice cubes and pour coffee to within about 1 inch of the top of the glass. Rest a spoon on top of the coffee and slowly pour whipping cream into the spoon. This will make the cream float on top of the coffee rather than dispersing into it right away.

Thai Iced Coffee.name: Thai Iced Coffee
Thai Iced Coffee.instructions: Prepare a pot of coffee at a good European strength. In the ground coffee, add 2 or 3 freshly ground cardamom pods. Sweeten while hot, then cool quickly. Serve in highball glass over ice, with cream. To get the layered effect, place a spoon atop the coffee and pour the milk carefully into the spoon so that it floats on the top of the coffee.

Thai Iced Tea.name: Thai Iced Tea
Thai Iced Tea.instructions: Combine Thai tea (i.e., the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.

The Evil Blue Thing.name: The Evil Blue Thing
The Evil Blue Thing.instructions: Pour ingredients into glass, and drop in a blue whale! The blue whale isn't really necessary, but it makes the drink more "fun".

Thriller.name: Thriller
Thriller.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Tia-Maria.name: Tia-Maria
Tia-Maria.instructions: Boil water, sugar and coffe for 10 mins and let cool. Add rum and vanilla. Put in clean bottle(s) and leave for 1 week before using.

Tom Collins.name: Tom Collins
Tom Collins.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

Tomato Tang.name: Tomato Tang
Tomato Tang.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

Tommy's Margarita.name: Tommy's Margarita
Tommy's Margarita.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Turf Cocktail.name: Turf Cocktail
Turf Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

Turkeyball.name: Turkeyball
Turkeyball.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Tuxedo Cocktail.name: Tuxedo Cocktail
Tuxedo Cocktail.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

Valencia Cocktail.name: Valencia Cocktail
Valencia Cocktail.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Vampiro.name: Vampiro
Vampiro.instructions: Vampiros may be made in a tall glass or an old fashioned glass. Bartenders may first "rim" the glass with Kosher Salt, which is done by placing a layer of Kosher Salt on a chopping board, moistening the glass' rim with lime juice or water, and then placing the upside down glass rim onto the Kosher Salt, so that the salt sticks to the moistened rim. The second step is to fill half the glass with ice and add one or two shooter glasses full of high quality Tequila. The next stage is to add the flavouring elements. This is done by squeezing a fresh lime into the glass, adding a few grains of salt, adding citrus-flavoured soda pop, until the glass is 4/5 full, and then adding spicy Viuda de Sanchez (or orange juice, lime juice and pico de gallo). The final step is to stir the ingredients so that the flavours are properly blended.

Van Vleet.name: Van Vleet
Van Vleet.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Vermouth Cassis.name: Vermouth Cassis
Vermouth Cassis.instructions: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve.

Vesper.name: Vesper
Vesper.instructions: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.

Vesuvio.name: Vesuvio
Vesuvio.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Veteran.name: Veteran
Veteran.instructions: Pour the rum and cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Victor.name: Victor
Victor.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Victory Collins.name: Victory Collins
Victory Collins.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

Vodka And Tonic.name: Vodka And Tonic
Vodka And Tonic.instructions: Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

Vodka Fizz.name: Vodka Fizz
Vodka Fizz.instructions: Blend all ingredients, save nutmeg. Pour into large white wine glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

Vodka Martini.name: Vodka Martini
Vodka Martini.instructions: Shake the vodka and vermouth together with a number of ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive and serve.

Vodka Russian.name: Vodka Russian
Vodka Russian.instructions: Mix it as a ordinary drink .

Waikiki Beachcomber.name: Waikiki Beachcomber
Waikiki Beachcomber.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Whiskey Sour.name: Whiskey Sour
Whiskey Sour.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve. If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

Whisky Mac.name: Whisky Mac
Whisky Mac.instructions: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

White Lady.name: White Lady
White Lady.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

White Russian.name: White Russian
White Russian.instructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

Whitecap Margarita.name: Whitecap Margarita
Whitecap Margarita.instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. This makes one drink.

Wine Cooler.name: Wine Cooler
Wine Cooler.instructions: Mix wine and soft drink. Pour into glass. Add ice.

Wine Punch.name: Wine Punch
Wine Punch.instructions: Combine all of the ingredients and pour over a block of ice.

Yellow Bird.name: Yellow Bird
Yellow Bird.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

Yoghurt Cooler.name: Yoghurt Cooler
Yoghurt Cooler.instructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up. Note: Use lots of ice in this one - great on hot days! To add ice: Remove the center of the cover while the blender is on - drop 3 or 4 ice cubs and blend until they're completely crushed.

Zambeer.name: Zambeer
Zambeer.instructions: Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice

Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft.name: Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft
Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft.instructions: Serve without ice. At least the juice shold have room temperature.

Zima Blaster.name: Zima Blaster
Zima Blaster.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, then fill with Zima. Mix and enjoy.

Zimadori Zinger.name: Zimadori Zinger
Zimadori Zinger.instructions: Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori. Don't stir. Garnish with a cherry.

Zinger.name: Zinger
Zinger.instructions: Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would.

Zipperhead.name: Zipperhead
Zipperhead.instructions: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, Then soda on top).

Zippy's Revenge.name: Zippy's Revenge
Zippy's Revenge.instructions: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and ammaretto. shake well to disolve the sugar in the Kool-Aid... serve cold

Zizi Coin-coin.name: Zizi Coin-coin
Zizi Coin-coin.instructions: Pour 5cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.

Zoksel.name: Zoksel
Zoksel.instructions: No specific mixinginstructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass. The lemon goes with it.

Zorbatini.name: Zorbatini
Zorbatini.instructions: Prepare like a Martini. Garnish with a green olive.

Zorro.name: Zorro
Zorro.instructions: add all and pour black coffee and add whipped cream on top.
